## ApiNamespaceAria2.getFiles() method

This method returns the file list of the download denoted by gid (string). The response is an array of structs. Values are strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFiles(gid: string): Promise<FileInfo[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gid | string | GID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[FileInfo](./aria2.fileinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

an array of structs
